clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used as a skin protectant and to relieve dryness and irritation of the skin L2586 L2581 Helps prevent and treat diaper dermatitis L2579

contraindications.disease: Studies have shown a positive association between atopic dermatitis and lanolin contact allergy L2588 The prevalence of lanolin allergy is low 1 8 2 5 A32788 Patch testing with lanolin is helpful in patients with dermatitis and suspected cosmetic allergy L2588 The acute dermal LD50 of lanolin oil was 10 mL kg for rabbits F15
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Lanolin treats cracked dry irritated skin and minor burns It prevents and treats sore nipples during breastfeeding L2577 L2589 Protects chafed skin or minor skin irritations due to various causes L2579 L2581
